short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download transparent PNG in HD format from Fotor BG Remover

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help downloading transparent PNG (in HD format) from Fotor BG Remover (https://www.fotor.com). The download process begin automatically after background is removed. The downloaded transparent PNG file will show up in download list.
